Description:
Regular expression as defined by POSIX Extended
        Regular Expressions (ERE) in Chapter 9 of "Information Technology - Portable Operating System
        Interface (POSIX) - Part 1: Base Definitions",
        IEEE 1003.1, June 2001.

Binhex-encoded binary pattern, per the HEXBIN data
        type.

A value used to indicate that this attribute is
        extended and the actual value is provided using the
        corresponding ext-* attribute.  See Section 5.1.1 of [RFC7970].
